name: Dragons: Titan Uprising
description:
Become a legendary puzzle champion as you swipe, match, battle and blast your way through lands, in a quest to save Berk from the nefarious Dragonroot Company. Join Hiccup and Toothless as you discover, breed and collect legendary dragons in the newest HTTYD puzzle RPG game on mobile!

MATCH & BATTLE
Choose a legendary puzzle rpg dragon battle team from nearly 100 dragons and lead them on an epic quest to save Berk. Face off against 3, 4 or 5 dragons and match 3 or more rune stones in over 750 unique puzzle rpg battles as you blast opponents with your Dragons’ Spirit Abilities!

BREED & NURTURE
Hatch eggs and breed wild Dragons in your very own Dragon Hatchery. Nurture your brood from small-scaled babies then marvel at the legendary Titan wings they become!

GROW & DISCOVER
Discover new regions and explore dungeons beyond the island of Berk as you experience a brand new quest to become a rpg puzzle champion! Use your spoils from epic dragon battles to grow your empire by upgrading and building new structures!

Swipe, match, battle & blast your way to become a legendary puzzle rpg champion then enjoy the continuation of this epic story in DreamWorks How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden World.
